sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-animated-slider'; import 'react-animated-slider/build/horizontal.css'; import "./WheelAnimations.css"; import "./css/Wheel.css" const content = [ { title: "Stopwatch", description: "A stopwatch program that allows saving of times to a database.", button: "Try It!", image: "./video/ruuner.mp4", codelang: "Javascript, PHP", github: "https://www.github.com" }, { title: "Magic 8 Ball", description: "The infamous magic 8 ball, has been used for many things over the years.", button: "Try It!", image: "", language: "Javascript, PHP", github: "" }, { title: "Weather", description: "Know the weather in your location where ever you are simply and easily.", button: "Try It!", image: "", language: "Javascript, PHP", github: "" }, { title: "Phone & Email", description: "A lightweight script to extract phone and email entries from text files.", button: "Try It!", image: "", language: "Javascript, PHP", github: "" }, ] const Wheel = () => { return ( <>
{content.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

{item.description}

{item.codelang} {item.github}
))}
) } export default Wheel;
